column1:
1. Air map of the area 
2. Bottle of 1000 salt tablets 
3. Sunglasses (for everyone) 
4. Magnetic compass 
5. 2 litres of water per person 
6. 45 calibre pistol (loaded) 
7. Overcoat (for everyone) 
8. First-aid kit 
9. Folding knife 
10.Torch with 4 battery-cells 
11. Plastic raincoat (large size)
12. A book entitled ‘Desert Animals That Can Be Eaten’
13. Parachute (red & white)
14. A cosmetic mirror
15. 2 litres of 180 proof liquor
